title: TUESDAY TEAMFIGHT! Come play vs the Boards Dev Team!
body:
*GAMES ARE FULL/DONE FOR THE DAY, THANKS FOR PLAYING* <3

COME PLAY VS THE RIOT BOARDS DEVELOPMENT TEAM
ASK US QUESTIONS ABOUT THE BOARDS N STUFF
AND GET DEMOLISHED BY US >:D

GAME NAME: TUESDAY TEAMFIGHT
PASSWORD: LOWERPING

—{{champion:111}}

These games literally fill up instantly. I was sitting here ~~stalking~~ waiting for this post to come up, the second it did, I tried to join, and jesus christ it was already full.

> [{quoted}](name=Lowvyr,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=bGBXQHLQ,comment-id=000d0000,timestamp=2015-08-25T21:26:17.318+0000)
>

At least you weren't perma banned from the lobby when you joined. {{item:3070}}

I tried to reinvite you but I couldn't :( I had to remove you to get our 5th rioter back in :(

next time, bae!

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Baconhawk,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=bGBXQHLQ,comment-id=000d000000000000,timestamp=2015-08-25T21:57:25.464+0000)
